description:
The Tour 30 raises the bar for how lightweight and functional an air bag-compatible pack can be. 30L of volume accommodates essentials for alpine missions and ski tours, while attachment points house crucial gear including ski-carry points and ice-tool holders. If required, pull the shoulder strap handle, and in about 3 seconds, the airbag deploys to its full capacity, reducing the likelihood of burial in an avalanche, and making you easier to locate if partially covered.

  • CONTACT U Frame™ with high density EVA back panel, hipbelt and shoulder straps for a comfortable carry
  • Large zippered front access to main compartment lets you get at items easily
  • Dedicated front pocket for avalanche safety equipment
  • Moulded, soft-lined goggle compartment
  • Zippered pocket and gear loop on hip belt
  • Stowable helmet carry can easily deploy when needed
  • Two attachments for ice axe and trekking poles
  • Integrated attachment point for carrying skis diagonally
  • Vertical or horizontal snowboard attachment
  • Includes pack and Removeable Airbag System 3.0. Refillable air cartridge is not included
  • Airbag system is transferrable to other Removeable Airbag System 3.0 compatible packs
  • Empty cartridges can be filled at approved centres such as dive shops or paintball stores
  • Systems are individually tested by the manufacturer before delivery
  • Internal hydration sleeve lets you add your own reservoir (sold separately)
  • Weight with pack, airbag system, and carbon air cartridge (sold separately) is 2.46 kg
name: Mammut Tour 30 Removal Airbag 3.0 - Unisex
